mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO tb_svc_sales( ACCEPT_TM, ACCEPT_TM_LOCAL, ADMISSION_TM, BRAND_ID, CANCEL_TM, CANCEL_TM_LOCAL, CREATED, CUSTOME_AGE_TP, CUSTOME_GENDER, CUSTOMER_CNT, CUSTOMER_TP, DISCOUNT, EXIT_TM, MEMO, OPEN_DT, ORDER_DIV, ORDER_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_ST, ORDER_TM, ORDER_TM_LOCAL, ORDER_TP, PATH_TP, PAY_METHOD, PERSON, POS_NO, REASON, RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_NO, REJECT_TM, REJECT_TM_LOCAL, RESERVE_END_TM, RESERVE_END_TM_LOCAL, RESERVE_TM, RESERVE_TM_LOCAL, SALES, SERVICE_CHARGE, STAFF_ID, STORE_ID, SUPPLY_VALUE, TABLE_NO, TAX, UPDATED, USE_COUPON, USER_ID, ACTUAL_SALES_AMT, ORDINAL, ORG_SALES_ID, SALES_ST, SALES_TM, SALES_TM_LOCAL) SELECT ACCEPT_TM, ACCEPT_TM_LOCAL, ADMISSION_TM, BRAND_ID, CANCEL_TM, CANCEL_TM_LOCAL, CREATED, CUSTOME_AGE_TP, CUSTOME_GENDER, CUSTOMER_CNT, CUSTOMER_TP, DISCOUNT, EXIT_TM, MEMO, OPEN_DT, ORDER_DIV, ID, ORDER_NO, 607005 AS ORDER_ST, ORDER_TM, ORDER_TM_LOCAL, ORDER_TP, PATH_TP, PAY_METHOD, PERSON, POS_NO, REASON, RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_NO, REJECT_TM, REJECT_TM_LOCAL, RESERVE_END_TM, RESERVE_END_TM_LOCAL, RESERVE_TM, RESERVE_TM_LOCAL, SALES, SERVICE_CHARGE, STAFF_ID, STORE_ID, SUPPLY_VALUE, TABLE_NO, TAX, UPDATED, USE_COUPON, USER_ID, SALES, 0, NULL, 809001, ORDER_TM, ORDER_TM_LOCAL FROM tb_svc_order WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO tb_svc_sales_item ( CAT_CD ,CAT_NM ,COUNT ,CREATED ,DISCOUNT ,IS_PACKING ,IS_STAMP ,ITEM_CD ,ITEM_ID ,ITEM_NM ,ITEM_TP ,MEMO ,NET_SALES ,OPT_CD ,OPT_ID ,OPT_NM ,OPT_PRICE ,ORDER_TM ,ORDER_TM_LOCAL ,ORDINAL ,PATH_TP ,PRICE ,PURCHASE_PRICE ,SALES ,SALES_ST ,SERVICE_CHARGE ,STAFF_ID ,TAX ,UPDATED ,PARTIAL_ORDINAL ,ACTUAL_SALES_AMT ,SALES_ID ) SELECT CAT_CD, CAT_NM, COUNT, CREATED, DISCOUNT, IS_PACKING, IS_STAMP, ITEM_CD, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NM, ITEM_TP, MEMO, NET_SALES, OPT_CD, OPT_ID, OPT_NM, OPT_PRICE, ORDER_TM, ORDER_TM_LOCAL, ORDINAL, '606006' AS PATH_TP, PRICE, PURCHASE_PRICE, SALES, '809001' AS SALES_ST, SERVICE_CHARGE, STAFF_ID, TAX, UPDATED, 0 AS PARTIAL_ORDINAL, PRICE, #{salesId, jdbcType=BIGINT} FROM tb_svc_order_item WHERE ORDER_ID = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO tb_svc_sales_pay ( SALES_ID, STAFF_ID, SALES_ST, ORDINAL, PARTIAL_ORDINAL, PAY_METHOD, CARD_NO, AMOUNT, PAY_TM, PAY_TM_LOCAL, TRAN_NO, MONTHLY_PLAIN, PG_KIND, CREATED, UPDATED ) SELECT #{salesId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, STAFF_ID, '809001' AS SALES_ST, ORDINAL, 0 AS PARTIAL_ORDINAL, PAY_METHOD, CARD_NO, AMOUNT, PAY_TM, PAY_TM_LOCAL, TRAN_NO, MONTHLY_PLAIN, PG_KIND, CREATED, UPDATED FROM tb_svc_order_pay WHERE id = #{payId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY ID ASC
mapper.select: SELECT S.RECEIPT_NO, S.ORDER_NO, COUNT(S.ID), S.ORDER_ST, F.NAME, S.POS_NO, SUM(I.SALES) FROM TB_SVC_SALES S LEFT JOIN TB_SVC_SALES_ITEM I ON S.ID = I.SALES_ID LEFT JOIN TB_SVC_STAFF F ON S.STAFF_ID = f.ID WHERE S.BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND S.STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND S.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
